CustomField.description: The total number of posts this user has made on the community.
CustomField.formula: ((Conversations_started__c + Ideas_submitted__c)- Ideas_submitted__c) + Article_replies__c + Questions_asked__c + Conversation_replies__c + Question_replies__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total number of posts this user has made on the community.
CustomField.label: Total posts
